# Server Rules
These are the **Core Rules** for playing in the Prospect Sector. They apply **at all times**, including *between rounds*, and on **all stations** within the sector.
This server is not a medium-roleplay server. [color=#ff0000]Only the Core Rules apply.[/color] Roleplay is encouraged, but never mandatory.
-------------------------------------------------------------
## Core Rules The following rules define acceptable behavior across the entire sector. All players are expected to follow them, regardless of role, department, or playstyle.
- [textlink="1. Admins have final say" link="RuleC1"] - [textlink="2. Don't be a dick" link="RuleC2"] - [textlink="3. No Hate Speech or Discriminatory Language" link="RuleC3"] - [textlink="4. No sexual content/themes, including ERP and no shock content" link="RuleC4"] - [textlink="5. Do not use out-of-game communication to coordinate or influence gameplay" link="RuleC5"] - [textlink="6. Do not attempt to evade bans" link="RuleC6"] - [textlink="7. English only in public channels" link="RuleC7"] - [textlink="8. Do not exploit the game, cheat, or use macros" link="RuleC8"] - [textlink="9. No alt accounts and no account sharing" link="RuleC9"] - [textlink="10. Do not ignore or abuse admin messages" link="RuleC10"] - [textlink="11. Do not threaten to ahelp or argue about rules in-game" link="RuleC11"] - [textlink="12. Players must be—and act—at least 16 years old" link="RuleC12"] - [textlink="13. Use realistic character names; do not use names of notable real-world individuals" link="RuleC13"] - [textlink="14. Do not use LOOC or OOC to share current-round information" link="RuleC14"]
